Uses of Class
city.cs.engine.World

  • Packages that use World 
    Package Description
    city.cs.engine
    Simple wrapper around the JBox2D physics engine.

    • Uses of World in city.cs.engine

      World Body.getWorld()
      The world in which this body exists.
